attributes.title: Eww fat orange man
attributes.review: Well one day I saw this fat perverted orange man in my room watching me sleep in my closet then I threw a bottle at him hoping he would find my hostages and my rats but when it hit him he just disappeared but the next day he was outside my house so I sent my space robots to kill him but he flew away and came in my house and took my hostages so I did what any person would do I threw a bible at him and a demon came out and flew into the sky as his carrot flesh melted off him so I took my hostages and his flesh and fed it to them so they wouldnâ€™t starve

attributes.title: Was this app made by idiots?
attributes.review: Issue #1: The app took DAYS to download. Issue #2: Once it downloaded, I didnâ€™t have any storage left and my photo gallery was overflown with pictures of Trump in a thong, DISGUSTING. Issue #3: After I deleted the 42,069 pictures, the app completely froze! Issue #4: After deleting and reinstalling the app, not only was my gallery taken over by Trump pictures AGAIN, but my phone also overheated and shut down for two days!!! This is a terrible app, I do not recommend ever getting!
